General.Name: M2I Corporation
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: M2I Corporation manufactures, sells, and exports human-machine interface (HMI) systems. It offers HMI systems for industrial automation and other automation applications, such as information service system and building automation system. The company's products offers interface solution for Serial, Ethernet, USB, Fieldbus, SD Card, CF Card, and HDMI to industrial, traffic, supervisory/control, advertisement, distribution industry, and education fields. M2I Corporation was founded in 1999 and is based in Anyang, South Korea.
